title.narrative: Support implementation of the National Water, Sanitation and Hygiene Strategy in Sierra Leone

description.narrative: This activity (Support implementation of the National Water, Sanitation and Hygiene Strategy in Sierra Leone) is a component of Supporting the Government of Sierra Leone to implement its National Water Supply and Sanitation Strategy reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £14,789,737. This component benefits Sierra Leone, and works in the following sector(s): Water sector policy and administrative management, Water resources conservation (including data collection). , with the following implementing partners: Adam Smith International. The start date is 01-02-2011 and the end date is 31-08-2015.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Water sector policy and administrative management

description.narrative: Environment - Water, Natural Resource Management and Environment - Environment - water resources management
Water supply and Sanitation - Water, Natural Resource Management and Environment - Water supply and Sanitation - policy, planning and administration
Aggregated spend of less than £500 - Financial Year 2015 Quarter 3
